site_name: Wilbraham House, D'oyley Street, LONDON, SW1X 9AF
description: Details required by condition 3e (notwithstanding the approved external mechanical service drawings, detailed schedule of the service trench works within the garden, the route, and methodology for removal, storage and reinstatement of garden paving and steps) of listed building consent 18/06937 (Variation of condition 2 (approved drawings) of listed building consent 17/05550 to allow internal amendments including alternative materials used, changes to layout, additional works to strengthen or renew floors, sound-proofing works, staining of study panelling, staining of floorboards, re-hanging various doors and replacing ironmongery on various doors, replacing dumb waiter car and runners and addition of electrical cupboard; and external amendments including installing ventilation grilles in wall, opening up window in study, replacement of roof and glazing to garage, replacement of roof to east extension, extension of slab from rear elevation to screen wall, and replacement of uPVC rainwater goods.)
